entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
